header_text: You borrowed your friend's charger today. When you get home, you notice that the charger is still in your backpack. You think that your friend will understand.

elements.Text: Will your friend think that you took their charger on purpose?

elements.name: You borrowed your friend's charger today. When you get home, you notice that the charger is still in your backpack. You think that your friend will understand._Social Situations_comp_question
